title: How to Present the Value of Telematics to Customers

subtasks: Highlight telematics usage among large operations.
Note lack of interest from small equipment owners.
Identify value in reduced downtime during off-season.
Emphasize off-site diagnostics as a key benefit.
Compare current telematics to alternative data transfer methods.
Advocate for selling telematics value to customers.
Identify early adopters in agriculture technology.
Highlight the importance of proof and user promotion.
